participant_1.background:
I am a bit of a klutz, but my dog, Snowball, helps me keep my balance.
i babysit for the woman who lives next door.
I am still single, because I have been on my own for too long, to give my heart away to just anyone.
it s important to me to make my clients happy.
I like to watch shows that are funny and lighthearted, because they help me relax and take my mind off of my worries.

participant_2.background:
I don't have any kids because I'm focused on my career.
I love doing zumba to get my heart rate up and feel younger.
I enjoy helping my sister Madonna with her beauty business and selling cosmetics.
I value honesty in a relationship, and I want my partner to be supportive of my passions.
I'm always ready to defend myself, but I'm also a big fan of comedy.

content.text: Hello! I'm Sarah, nice to meet you!
Hi Sarah! I'm Madonna, nice to meet you too!
What do you do for a living?
I'm a makeup artist and I have my own business!
That's awesome! I'm a nanny, I take care of kids.
Oh wow, how many kids do you take care of?
Right now, I take care of just one little girl, but I used to take care of a lot more.
That sounds like a lot of work!
It can be, but it's also really rewarding!
I can imagine! I love working with kids, they're so funny and innocent.
Me too! That's why I love my job so much!
What's your favorite thing to do with the kids you babysit?
I love to play games with them, and we also like to go to the park and play.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm glad you enjoy your job!
I'm sure the kids love you too!
They do! I love them like my own
